column4: Ok with xchat-gnome is there a way I can change where the users are?
no but i mean i don't like the popup list.
I want the popup list to show on the side.
So I can actually tell who's in the room.
So I just learned how to dualboot, and I'm super proud of myself.
Well I tried dual booting with linux first.
That has the user list type that you want.
Yes, you can't do that in xchat-gnome. You could install xchat though.
The actual xchat is in universe though, if you install the xchat package.
I actually use a downloaded copy even though I have a proper licence, because it installs more cleanly.
Actually I just have the media version.
But hey it works and it gets the job done.
